{"id":1811852138,"question_id":4063,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1761450934,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"503 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1811852138/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Distinct Subarrays Divisible by K in Sorted Array","memory":"36.3 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def numGoodSubarrays(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:\n        N = len(nums)\n\n        pref = [0] * (N+1)\n        for i in range(N):\n            pref[i+1] += (pref[i] + nums[i]) % k\n\n        ans = 0\n        m = defaultdict(lambda: 0)\n\n        for i in range(N):\n            m[pref[i-1]] += 1\n            if pref[i] in m:\n                ans += m[pref[i]]\n\n        for i, l in groupby(nums):\n            # s = 1 if i % k == 0 else int(k / (i % k))\n            s = 1 if i % k == 0 else int(k / gcd(i, k))\n            it = s\n            l = list(l)\n            while it <= len(l):\n                ans -= max(0, len(l) - it)\n                it += s\n\n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-distinct-subarrays-divisible-by-k-in-sorted-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1295}
